title: Clean up house on CUDAStream
body_html:
Stack:
    ⚪️  #14191 Add hash functions for Stream, CUDAStream; fix Device hash function  💛
    ⚪️  #14246 Delete legacy THCStream (long live THCStream).  💛
    ⚫️  #14247 Clean up house on CUDAStream  💛

Just a bunch of clean up to get the code in a good state before we
enshrine it in c10.

Billing of changes:

  • Inline all "pointer" API functions into their real implementations,
    so we don't have a bunch of dead pointer functions hanging around.
  • Replace all occurrences of int64_t with DeviceIndex, as appropriate
  • Rename device field to device_index
  • Add documentation for everything in CUDAStream.h
  • Bring CUDAStream to API parity with Stream (e.g., support equality)
  • Delete uncheckedSetCurrentCUDAStream, it didn't work anyway because
    StreamId to internal pointer conversion has a bunch of ways it can
    fail. Just hope for the best!

Differential Revision: D13141949

Stack:
    :white_circle:  #14191 Add hash functions for Stream, CUDAStream; fix Device hash function  [:yellow_heart:](https://our.internmc.facebook.com/intern/diff/D13119624/)
    :white_circle:  #14246 Delete legacy THCStream (long live THCStream).  [:yellow_heart:](https://our.internmc.facebook.com/intern/diff/D13121531/)
    :black_circle:  **#14247 Clean up house on CUDAStream**  [:yellow_heart:](https://our.internmc.facebook.com/intern/diff/D13141949/)

Just a bunch of clean up to get the code in a good state before we
enshrine it in c10.

Billing of changes:
- Inline all "pointer" API functions into their real implementations,
  so we don't have a bunch of dead pointer functions hanging around.
- Replace all occurrences of int64_t with DeviceIndex, as appropriate
- Rename device field to device_index
- Add documentation for everything in CUDAStream.h
- Bring CUDAStream to API parity with Stream (e.g., support equality)
- Delete uncheckedSetCurrentCUDAStream, it didn't work anyway because
  StreamId to internal pointer conversion has a bunch of ways it can
  fail.  Just hope for the best!

Differential Revision: [D13141949](https://our.internmc.facebook.com/intern/diff/D13141949/)
